statements: DELETE FROM TraineeFeedback WHERE trainee_id = 100 AND rating > 3;
DELETE FROM training_experience WHERE improvement_plan IS NULL;
DELETE FROM training_experience WHERE experience_id IN (SELECT experience_id FROM training_experience WHERE feedback_id = 2);
DELETE FROM training_experience WHERE trainee_id = 5 AND experience_id > 10;
DELETE FROM training_experience WHERE completed = false AND training_duration > '5 hours';
DELETE FROM question WHERE session_id = 5 AND is_active = FALSE;
